caption.p: Relative influence of explanatory variables in the different algorithms after removal of the least‐contributing ones: (a) generalized linear model (GLM), (b) gradient boosting machine (GBM), (c) gradient boosting machine using boosted regression trees package (GBM‐BRT), (d) random forest (RF), (e) support vector machine (SVM), (f) deep learning neural network (DNN), (g) ensemble model (ENS)
